comment.author: 76016463@N00

comment._content: artolog--Thank you for enriching the story of this building. As much as I love the old black-and-white photography, the opportunity to follow your google maps link and see the warm-color of the beautiful stones, along with the full shape of the palace, is very rewarding.  Thanks for your many contributions to the Flickr Commons! -- Helena (LOC)
